answers.answer: I got the same :( im 32/4 and they wont give me anymore unless medically necessary..

I'm not sure if that's normal or not, I have had 4 ultrasounds already and I'm 17 weeks.I signed up for a university study for women that are pregnanct to get their heart check of some sort so after that is done they always do an ulstrasound so I can see my baby :) I have another 5 ultrasounds to go so I'm happy I signed up for the study, I worry to much but seeing my baby makes me feel a lot better lol.
I only got 3, one was a medical emergengy so I should have only got 2, one at 12 weeks and one at 21 weeks :)
I'm 24 weeks and I've had two. And another in a week. I get them every 4 weeks.
It depends on where you are and your pregnancy.  If you are considered low risk then two is normal in alot of places.
Yes its normal. Most insurances cover only 2 or 3 at the most bc theres no reason for more unless baby is having problems.
I got one from these ladies studying to be an ultrasound tech, one for gender, one to confirm gender, and one because I have gestational diabetes. Not sure if I'll get another one or not.
Yes 2 scans is normal for a normal pregnancy. You can have more but you would have to go private.

question: My whole pregnancy i had 2 ultra sounds one when i was 12 weeks and another at 18 to find the gender. Is it normal? When will i even get another one i kind of want to see my baby:/
title: 32 weeks and 6 days
